H0.text: To which family of birds do Linnets belong. Sparrow

H1.text: To which family of birds do Linnets belong. Bunting

H2.text: To which family of birds do Linnets belong. Warbler

H3.text: To which family of birds do Linnets belong. Finch

A4.text: The common linnet is a small passerine bird of the finch family, Fringillidae.
